1.content: Choose your character,who shall the hero be?
1.title: Your Character

choices: Percy decideds to investigate the problem
Percy and Annabeth gets attacked by monsters
11.content:
As I wondered through the forest in Camp Half-Blood, I noticed something different, usually, there will be satyrs and tree nymphs around, but all that I can see is trees. And hear silence. Something is wrong, but, how? I don't know. Annabeth came after me and called:" Percy! What were you thinking? Wandering in to the woods when Chiron said that it is forbidden to enter."
I said:" Huh? Why?"
Annabeth said:" Because the monsters became crazy and started attacking everyone who enters!"


What happens next?
11.title: Percy Jackson

111.content:
You see, I am Percy, and even though I am no Annabeth, I was curious. Since when did the forests become dangerous? Camp was the safest place on earth for me, how were beasts even allowed to enter? I approached Chiron.
"Chiron? About the forest, is it true that the beasts in it are turning wild?" I asked.
"Oh, if only I could say no!" Chiron answered.
111.title: Percy goes to Chiron

choices: Knock her out and carry her back to the cabins
112.content:
"Please don't tell Chiron I'm here. Oh, and, go back to the cabins, I'll investigate the problem." I ordered.

"No! I'm coming with you!" Annabeth cried.
112.title: Percy decideds to investigate the problem

choices: You see a Stone Giant, who is trying to use the bathroom
You see an Armored Warbear, he doesn't seem hostile
You see a  elder hyrda, dangerous as ever
113.content:
There is rustling in the bushes....
It's all dead silence. Annabeth looked at me, worried. A deafening roar was all I heard as Annabeth and me fell to the ground.
As I looked up, I saw a...
113.title: Percy and Annabeth gets attacked by monsters

choices: Wait For Him to Come and Fight to the Death
1131.content:
The stone giant goes towards the bathroom in the forest (for satyrs). He looked at me and said:" Me want PRIVACY!!!"

I was knocked back down by his roar, after a while I regain control over my body, I looked up again. The stone giant is in the bathroom already.
1131.title: Privacy

11311.content: The stone giant was furious and he lifted his 2000 ton butt and sh!t at ME!!! The pile of rock poop was all I saw before I descended into the Underworld....
11311.title: The End

11312.content:
The stone giant came out from the bathroom, and he saw me. He bellowed:" Trying to peek at me? DIE YOU PERV!!!"

I pulled out my pen and uncapped it, it morphed into a sword instantly. I charged towards the stone giant, bad mistake. The giant pulled out a HUGE stone club with a dozen one feet wide and three feet long spikes. Despite his huge mass, the stone giant was quick. He slammed at the place I was an eighth of a second before. The spikes inflicted a half inch deep wound up my whole arm. I was demobilized by the pain, my knees buckled and I knelt down, and the giant came in for the kill. I tried roll aside but the pain was too strong. Before the club crushed me, an arrow was shot directly into the giant's eye. The giant disintegrated before my eyes. It was Chiron!

Chiron helped me up and he bandaged my wound. He asked me if I want to go and rest and I said no. Chiron dragged me out of the woods and went away, telling me to keep away from the forest for now.

I still wanna invest the forest, what should I do?
11312.title: Wait For Him to Come and Fight to the Death

11313.content:
I started to walk away, but suddenly the stone giant bursted out of the bathroom. He saw me, and roared:"You are son of POSEIDON?!! Give me back me WIFE!!!!"

I uncapped Riptide without thinking. The giant charged at me and I rolled aside. I made a quick jab at his enormous toes, but his skin was so hard that Riptide couldn't even pierce it. I then swiftly took a few steps back.
11313.title: Walk Away Like a Sissy

1132.content:
The armored bear roared once again. He seem to be demanding something. I said aloud "What do you want boy?"
The bear seems to tell you to follow it, waving it's hand it disappeared into the forest.
Decisions?
1132.title: You see an Armored Warbear, he doesn't seem...

12.content:
Just letting you know, demigod parties are the best celebrations you will ever attend. They're like your birthday, New Year's, Fourth of July, and whatever other holiday you want all rolled up into one. There's all the food you can eat, every imaginable (non-alcoholic) beverage you can drink, the latest hits playing on the stereo, and your best friends hanging out with you.

That's why I, Annabeth Chase, left early.

It didn't feel right. Grover was there, and Nico, and all my half-brothers and sisters from Athena's Cabin. Actually, everybody in the camp was there. Including Percy, of course...and Thalia. Yes, even the Hunters were persuaded to come. We were celebrating the finish of the new cabins. Percy used his brain for once and asked the gods for ALL the demigods--even the kids of the 'minor' gods--to be claimed and brought to camp. I for one had a lot more half-siblings, and there were a ton more cabins. And none of them were empty anymore. Even Zeus's cabin had an occupant--this kid named Ivan, who thinks I'm the smartest person since Einstein (who, by the way, was also a child of Athena). But I'm getting off-subject. I left because I wasn't having fun. True, I was kind of the 'guest of honor', since I designed about all of the new cabins. But it just wasn't right. You know before, how I mentioned that all of my friends were there? Well, I didn't tell the whole truth. There was someone missing, and my whole body aches when I think about the piece of my heart that's gone.

Luke. Yes, he gave himself to Kronos. Yes, he turned against all of us....including me. Yes, he tried to kill us on more than one occasion. But none of that matters. He sacrificed himself in the end, to save us. When we were up there on Mount Olympus and Luke asked me if I loved him, I said no. And it's still true. I admired him, looked up to him, and tried to be with him, but I never loved him. Not in the way he meant. Luke was like the big brother I never had, the father I never knew I had, the best friend I'll never see again. And that's why I can't enjoy myself. How can I, when he was ripped out of my life like that?

I sat on Zeus's Fist in the middle of the woods, enjoying the night breeze. Everything was so peaceful and quiet, especially after the whirlwind the past few months have been. Building the new cabins, finding new demigods...and the Prophecy. The new Great Prophecy. I frowned and pushed that out of my mind...I didn't want to think about it.

"Annabeth!" With a start, I heard someone calling my name. Then I realized I was crying, and I hurriedly brushed the tears off of my cheeks. Whoever it was, I couldn't let them see me cry.
12.title: Annabeth Chase

121.content:
"Annabeth?" It's Percy, of course. He would notice I was gone. Well, the others might notice, but he's the only one who would come after me.

I turned and waved. "Hey, Seaweed Brain," I called, hoping he wouldn't hear the slight catch in my voice. "Got tired of the party already? What, you can't handle your adoring fans?"

"You wouldn't believe them," Percy answered. "They actually ask for autographs. Of course, none of them have a pen, and I don't either. Then they see Riptide and they get mad because I keep saying I don't have anything to write with!" He looked so genuinely frustrated that I had to laugh. "It's not funny," Percy insisted, but he smiled anyway. When I didn't come down, he stuck Riptide in his pocket and scrambled up. "So, what's wrong, Wise Girl?"

Normally I would have rolled my eyes--gods, he can't think of a more original nickname?--but I was too startled to do anything except stare at him. "W-wrong?" I stammered, hating myself for doing it. "Nothing. I got tired of the party, and..." my voice trailed off as I saw he didn't believe me. My story was pretty weak.

"Luke." It wasn't a question.

To anyone else, I would have lied. I don't know why I didn't. But there was just something...maybe it was the way the wind blew his hair perfectly around his face. Or the look in his eyes: sympathetic and understanding. Whatever it was, I took a deep breath and spilled my guts about what I was really feeling.

When I was done, I bit my lip, anxious to hear what Percy would say.
121.title: It's Percy

1211.content:
Percy stayed quiet for a few minutes, but the expression on his face told me he hadn't been ready to hear that. When he finally did speak, his voice was icy. "You know, Annabeth, Luke is gone. I'm sorry, but he is, and you can't get him back. You need to open your eyes and see that there are other people around you. Get over him."

That made me angry. "Percy, you don't get it. Luke was like a brother to me! Sometimes I think he was the only one who truly understood me, and I loved him for that." The last part slipped out before I could stop myself. The sad, hurt look in Percy's eyes made me want to snatch my words out of the air. But once you've said something, there's no going back. Besides, it was true. ...Wasn't it?

"All right, fine." Percy's words were still cold, but he couldn't hide the hurt in his voice. "I'm sorry that I can't be Luke for you." With that, he jumped off the Fist and started to storm off. Instead of walking back to camp, though, he headed towards the ocean side. To get there, you have to cross a stream; but Percy just held the water back and walked on dry land. Showoff. He disappeared from view, and I settled on the rocks. He'll be back, I thought. He always comes back.



It was colder now, much colder. I had been waiting for about half an hour, maybe more, and Percy hadn't returned. I had a bad feeling now, like this was one of those times that I should have kept my mouth shut. I haven't had much of those with Percy, and when I did, we always made up. But something was telling me that he was even angrier than he had let on. With a sigh, I slid off of Zeus's Fist and started back to camp.

As soon as I walked out of the woods, I knew something was wrong. There were campers running all over the place, and Chiron wasn't even calling for order. If anything, he looked worried..."What's happened?" I shouted, running towards him. "Chiron, what's wrong?"
1211.title: He's angry and storms off.

12111.content:
"Percy's gone" said Chiron, then he turned to me." You must go and find him, Annabeth."

" Huh? What, P...P...Percy's g...gone?" I can't accept this. First, Luke...died, I winced at the thought of that word, now Percy's gone. Who knows what will happen next?

Chiron looked at me carefully and asked:" Are you all right, Annabeth?"

I replied, and lied:" I'm fine Chiron, let me go find him."

Chiron sighed and said:" Such a troublesome boy, you should keep an eye on him, Annabeth."

I answered:" I will Chiron, I promise to River Styx that I will bring Percy back alive." And upon hearing that Chiron left for the Big House.

I thought to myself:" Where am I supposed to search for Percy?"
12111.title: "Percy's gone"

1212.content:
For a little while, Percy was quiet. Then he turned to me, and I could tell he understood. "You know, I think I know what you're going through," he told me. "Like when Rachel became the Oracle, I didn't know how to feel about that. It's not on the higher level that yours was, but I get the idea. And I just want to tell you, I understand completely."

I grinned at him in relief. Why had I been worried? He was amazing about this kind of stuff. He leaned in closer, so I did too, and our lips were almost touching...

"Help!" someone screamed. We both jerked apart and looked around wildly. A dryad came running from the forest. "A fire," the dryad cried out. "The forest is on fire! Our trees are burning, and it's spreading towards camp! Put it out," she pleaded to Percy.

"A fire?" I asked in shock. How could the camp's forest catch on fire?
1212.title: He understands.

122.content:
"Where are you?" I heard a thud. "That tree was not there two seconds ago, I swear..."

"Grover!" I shouted, trying to keep from laughing. "Are you...all right?"

A curly head with two little stubby horns poked up from behind a bush. Grover was covered in leaves and dirt, and had the beginnings of a black eye. "There you are, thank the gods!" He trotted over to Zeus's Fist, not even bothering to shake off the twigs stuck to his fur. "There's....at the camp....he's trying to....bla-ha-ha! I'm overexcited!"

I rolled my eyes. Grover, overexcited? What a surprise. "Slow down, I can barely understand what you're saying." I slid off the Fist and hurried over to him. "What's wrong?"

Grover took a deep breath to collect himself. "A new demigod, trying to come up the hill. Something's wrong. Ladon won't let him in, and there's a monster after the kid! We need you, Ladon will listen to you!"

I nodded. Ladon was the dragon that guarded Half-Blood Hill, and I was kind of the unofficial caretaker of him. If he wouldn't listen to anyone else, he would almost definitely listen to me. As we ran through the hill, I frowned as I thought about the situation. A half-blood that Ladon wouldn't let enter? That had never happened before, even when Ivan showed up and almost fried Ladon with a lightning bolt.

We burst out of the woods and streaked across the campgrounds. The Big House was still lit up for the party. But instead of people dancing and eating, they were milling around outside, looking confused and scared. Some of the experienced campers were grabbing their weapons and running towards Ladon's post, where Thalia's tree had been a long time ago. When I got closer, I picked out Percy and Thalia running at the front of the pack. Percy uncapped Riptide and it grew into a three-foot Celestial bronze sword. Thalia strung an arrow, and both continued towards Ladon. All of a sudden, the dragon swung around and let loose a blast of fire! I gasped as my two friends narrowly avoided being burnt to a crisp.

Fear lent wings to my feet, and I sped past Grover. "Ladon!" I shrieked at the top of my voice. "Stop!" He raised his great head in confusion, giving Thalia and Percy time to slip past him. I could see the small figure of the half-blood, being relentlessly pursued by a hellhound the size of a bus.

I finally reached the hill. "Here, boy," I called. "Listen to me. It's me, Annabeth. What's wrong?" I stroked him, calming him down. "The hellhound is the enemy here. Help out Percy and Thalia." Ladon blinked at me, then reared back and spit out a ball of flame. It struck the hellhound, who yelped as it was vaporized.

"Yeah! Good boy," I cheered. The dragon snorted smoke out of his nostrils, looking displeased. I didn't pay attention and ran to help Percy and Thalia, who were kneeling by the unconscious demigod. "How is he?" I blurted. "Let me see. I have some ambrosia and nectar..."

"Annabeth, wait," cautioned Thalia, and Percy put a hand on my arm. I frowned at them and pulled the ambrosia out of my pack.

"Here you..." I stopped when I saw the kid. My breath came hard and fast, and my heart started beating wildly. There, on the ground, was the unconscious face of a 12-year-old Luke.
122.title: It's Grover

choices: Annabeth refuses to go with Percy
1221.content:
Luke woke up, he looked at me with half-sleeping eyes.

I whispered to him:" Luke?"

He answered:" Um.... do I know you? Plus, my name is not Luke, it's Luka, although you're one letter away." He smiled. I examined him carefully, he looks exactly like Luke except his face is much more childish and happy. All of a sudden, tears swell up in my eyes again.

Luka said:" Sorry, I didn't mean to hurt you..."

Then Percy came by my side and said hold my shoulders, then he turned back Luka and said:" Its not your fault, Thalia, take him to Hermes cabin. I will take Annabeth on a walk."

Thalia started to protest, but Percy cut her short. Now Percy is kind of like second in charge of the camp, After Mr. D went out on vacation in the Bermudas. Percy turned to look at me.
1221.title: Luke?

12212.content:
"Fine," I agreed. While Thalia led the confused Luka away, Percy took my hand and began walking me towards the ocean. We didn't speak on the way over there. When we reached the sea, I sat down in the cool sand and rested my head in my hands. I could feel Percy hovering anxiously beside me. He wanted to make me feel better, but he didn't know how. So we both sat there in silence, listening to the waves lap up on the shore.

"I was just thinking about him, you know," I told Percy, my voice muffled. He looked at me, confused, but didn't say anything. "Luke. I felt horrible again. It's been happening lately. Whenever I try to enjoy myself, he pops into my mind, and I feel miserable. Why is that happening? Why now, six months after he was...killed?"

"I thought something was wrong," Percy told me, looking worried. I lifted my head to look at him. His green eyes were gazing at me, without any of the embarrassment they used to have, and I felt a shiver run the length of my body. He really did care. "Is there anything I can do?"

I grinned at him, even though my heart wasn't really in it. "Well, we haven't gone swimming in a while..." I winked at Percy, and he smiled back. He stood up, grabbed my hand, and we ran down to the surf, plunging into the waves. The water washed higher, past my waist up to my shoulders. Finally, when I couldn't feel the sandy bottom beneath my feet, we stopped. Percy called up a current that it kept us afloat. Some curious dolphins swam nearer and Percy encouraged them, talking to them with his mind, asking them for a ride. They obliged, and soon we were zipping through the water. I laughed from the sheer exhilaration of it.

Suddenly, three more dolphins jumped up in front of us. I grinned and nudged Percy, but he frowned. The other dolphins were chattering frantically, making short leaps but always swimming back to us. "What are they saying?" I asked Percy.

"A tanker...there's a huge oil spill. Some of the sea animals are trapped in it...including two hippocampi!" He shot me a look. We both knew how dangerous that was. If humans came to help with the spill, and found the mythological creatures, who knew what would happen?

"I have to help," he told me, just as I said, "Let's go."

He frowned at me. "Annabeth, go back and get help. Get Blackjack and some of the other pegasi, and tell Chiron!"

"No," I objected. "You'll need my help. You can't do everything, and we know you can't control oil, so I can do whatever you will."
12212.title: Annabeth agrees

choices: I don't care who the freaking hell is talking!
13.content:
Ahhhh! Lying down under the sun is sooooo comfortable! I spread my self on the beach, sunbathing is such a luxurious way to enjoy life. Percy and Annabeth went to the Maldives on a "honeymoon", and only I was one of our trio left in camp. I was starting to enjoy when I suddenly had a very bad feeling, almost like I'm scared. I heard a faint voice in my head:" Help me Grover...... do......copy? Can......hear me? I'm kid ...... in...... Bermu ......Tell...... Chiron. Fast......<cough>......Seven......answer the call....... Storm......fire......world must fall......Oath......final breath...... Foes......arm......Gates of Death. I understand now! Gro..."

The connection was disrupted, I'm a hundred percent sure it was a SOS signal from Percy. I ran screaming towards the Big House. I saw a Hunter here with Chiron, whispering something to him. My issue is urgent, but should I interupt a conversation, especially a Hunter's.
13.title: Grover Underwood

131.content:
Yeah, she's a Hunter, under the protection of Artemis. And she could beat me down and tie me up faster faster than it takes Apollo to make up a haiku about it. Which is precisely what makes them so hot. (The Hunters, not Apollo.) But Percy is my best friend! And he's obviously in trouble. And that equals up to one thing: That Hunter is going down.

"Chiron!" I shout. "I've got to talk to you."

The Hunter turns to me and frowns. Oh, man, she's got green eyes. "Well, I'm talking to him first. There's a little thing called 'manners', which you may or may not have heard of." She looks me up and down, wrinkling her nose. "Never mind."

I'm too frantic to be insulted. Plus, she's so dang cute that I wouldn't have minded anyway. "Well, there's a little thing called trouble, and it's happening right now. To Percy Jackson. Whom you may or may not have heard of." Her eyes widen, and she looks over at Chiron. He blinks in astonishment, then leans over to look at me.

"You're sure it was Percy?" I nod so fast I feel like my horns are going to snap off. "All right." He turns to the Hunter. "Please leave us."

She opens her mouth to say something, thinks better of it, and quickly strides off. "Now, Grover. What is this about Percy?" Chiron asks, a note of worry plain in his voice. I tell him everything. When I'm finished, his forehead is lined. "That is trouble, indeed." He starts to trot off.

"Hey! Wait for me!" I call. Chiron turns back and says...
131.title: I don't care a freaking hell

choices: Convince the ol' horse man to let me go.
1312.content: "Stay here!" Chiron ordered. I hesitated, normally, I will be 100% obedient when Chiron gives out orders, but it's about Percy, man! I walked reluctantly back to my "stable"(I really hate those guys who called my shack a stable, now even I start calling it "stable"! Damn!). I tossed and turned in my bed, I couldn't decide. Is it Percy, or follow orders? Man a tough question...
1312.title: Stay here?!

choices: Make an excuse and stay with this HOT HOT Hunter!
13121.content:
I decided to sneak off. All is well until I accidentally stepped on someone's foot. We both yelped. I looked at the person I stepped on. Dang! It's that super cute Hunter. She eyed me suspiciously and asked:" Where are you going?"

"Uhh, to seek advice from the Oracle." I lied.

"The Oracle is not in the Big House anymore." Damn! I forgot that Rachael is now the new Oracle. "I got orders from Thalia to keep an eye on you."

Wow! This hot girl being my "baby-sitter"? I gotta brag to my friends!

Suddenly, Juniper appeared beside me. Shoot, I forgot all about her. She looked angry.

"Juniper... I... I... I don't know who she is!" I pointed at that Hunter.

Juniper looked confused:" What? Of course you don't know her! She's a Hunter, name's..." She looked at the Hunter, the Hunter nodded " Emily." She pulled my arm:"Come! I need your help!"
13121.title: Percy!!! (Sneak off)

14.content:
Where am I? Why am I here? Haven't I died, am I in The Underworld? What is happening? I blinked hard, and a face drifted above me.

" Welcome Luke Castellian, our hero. Welcome to the Organization." The face said.

" What? Haven't I died yet? What is the Organization?" I asked.

"The Organization is a group of titans uncaught by the Olympians, we currently have fourteen members, excluding you." The face said.

I looked around the room, there is fifteen chairs floating in the air. The guy that talked to me said," I am Octraseus, the leader of the Organization. We have heard that you have served under our king before. We like to have you join us."

My Choice?
14.title: Luke Castellian

141.content:
"Of course!" I exclaimed.

Octraseus said:" Good, Luke, you shall be the Fifteenth member of the Organization, here is your seat."

He pointed at the empty seat. I sat on it, it felt like drakon scales.

A Titan who is in a black cloak stood up and said," Welcome Organization's members,"

Octraseus whispered to you:" This is Konhaseus, the Leader."

Konhaseus boomed:" Luke our new member, will you show us what you can do?
141.title: " Of Course!!"

143.content:
" Sorry Sorry Sorry Sorry, No way No way No way, F**k you, I wont I wont I wont, Shut up Shut up Shut up, Damn you baby." I sang.

" You will even if I have to CHAIN you!!" Octraseus screamed.

I grinned," Fight me."

Octraseus edged closer, faster than a striking cobra, he swung a huge battle axe at me. I let my instincts take over, and I sidestepped. I counterattacked and punched his chest and it felt like punching steel.

"Ouch!" I yelped.

Octraseus saw the opening and caught me by the throat. He chuckled," Not so fast are you now, huh?"
143.title: Sorry Sorry

choices: Kill Octraseus and try to flee
1431.content:
I struggled to say "Hey! Easy mate, I was just playing around!"
"Good" replied Octraseus, "I knew you'd join!"
Octraseus set you on the floor as other members approached.
1431.title: Give in

14312.content: I stabbed Octraseus with my knife. He yelped and let go of me. I bolted to the door as fast as possible, but someone caught me. He cracked open my head with a powerful karate move and finished me.
14312.title: Kill Octraseus and try to flee

14313.content:
I must be nuts! I wanted to fight them all! Well, I'll try at least! They shall all die by the power of my hands, I thought cunningly.
I took out an axe, one very unexpected weapon and hacked Octraseus apart.
Taking advantage of the element "surprise", I continued to attack each member, dismembering heads and limbs as I swung my axe furiously.
Guts were hacked up, brains- ~~~~!!!! 18+ 18+ 18+ !!!!!~~~~~
Suddenly, a chilling cold hand grabbed my arm and a wave of pain shot through me! I was immobilized!
You turned around, you see a familiar face, hey that guy is .............
14313.title: Try to fight them all!

choices: Take out a .357 magnum and kill everyone
Help Octarseus up and be friendly.
1432.content:
I replied,"You can say that again!" as I twirled around and did a counter move, throwing Octraseus to the floor.
I pinned Octraseus to the ground, immobilizing him.
I yelled "It's time to kick some @*s!" as I relentlessly punched Octraseus with studded fighting gloves which were just put on.
The remaining of the organization members rushed to help Octraseus.
His life is in my hands!
What am I gonna do with him?
1432.title: Continue to fight him

14322.content:
I pulled out my .357 magnum revolver and shot Octraseus and the Organization members who were rushing to help.
Bang! Bang! Bang! Bang! Bang!
The deafening shots killed each member.
I realized that I have only one bullet left. This isn't good.
14322.title: Take out a .357 magnum and kill everyone

choices: Take out your automatic AA-12 shotgun and kill everyone
Fight them with hand, like a man!
143222.content: I thought about suicide, not a good plan!
143222.title: More choices

15.content:
My name is Lyner. I don't know what was happening, but something was definitely wrong. People think I'm a maniac, but it's true. The monsters. They will never believe me, they can't even see it. I know too that you think I'm a lunatic, but trust me, you wouldn't want to live like me. Monster chasing you all the way from Miami to Manhattan, not cool.

I don't know why I headed for Manhattan, but it seemed right to me. Yes call me a maniac, trusting my instincts, rather than thinking. But if you were ever in a situation like this, would you stay calm?

First, my dad, called Leard Barsette, called me to leave, go to Camp Half-Blood. Now how the heck am I supposed to know where Camp Half-Blood was? As helpful as a piece of rotten meat, my mom told me to follow my instincts, which I did. Now I was near a hill I figured was called Half-Blood Hill. Worst, there was an ugly dragon guarding an imaginary boarder around the hill, whose breath smells like acid. All I have is a necklace my dad gave me. Now tell me how am I gonna fight a dragon with a necklace? I clutched my hand over the necklace, praying to Jesus, telling him to help me. This is when the necklace glowed. It started to change, into a sword. Damn it! I'll get arrested for carrying dangerous weapons.

Upon seeing the sight of a sword, the dragon hissed and striked at me, I rolled aside. Suddenly, a feel of fire surged inside me, granting me strength. I ducked and rolled, then I saw an opening, so I counterattacked and swiped one of the heads off. The dragon hissed in pain and started to attack recklessly. After I chopped two more heads off, a girl that have strange grey eyes came to the dragon. She whispered something to the dragon and turned to me.

I nearly lost my breath, she was beautiful, no, gorgeous! I didn't know what to say. To my suprise, she blushed, although the one blushing should be me. Look I have this special power on girls, they fall in love with me the moment they see me. Then the girl said:" Hello, this is Camp Half-Blood, my name is Annabeth, what's yours?"

I stammered:" H...huh? Oh! My name is Lyner."

She smiled:" Nice to meet you Lyner."

I felt dizzy, a nosebleed is coming up, but I controlled it. Somehow I get to control water, weird. Then I realized that she said that this is Camp Half-Blood, I was so excited, so I yell:" This is CAMP HALF-BLOOD? I FINALLY GOT HERE WITHOUT DYING!!"

Annabeth looked puzzled, she asked:" Huh? What do you mean?"

I said:" My father told me to come to Camp Half-Blood, so I made it."

She thought for a while, then she said:" Come with me."

I...
15.title: Lyner Barsette

151.content:
I thought it over for a while. Let's weigh the options, I said to myself. Stay out here, where monsters can attack at any time; or follow this beautiful girl into the camp my father told me to come to? It was kind of a one-sided contest, and I don't have to tell you which side won. I followed her into the camp. The dragon eyed me suspiciously and blew smoke out of his nostrils. Annabeth ignored him, so I did too.

We walked through this place that looked like a normal camp, I guess. There were these huge cabins all in one circle. Some of them looked really crowded, but there were two or three that looked like there were only a few kids in them. There was a lake with a bunch of canoes, a sand volleyball pit, and a large circle with a bunch of dummies in it. I guessed that was for football practice? A wild-looking forest made up the border, and it stretched on for as far as I could see. I saw a girl, probably only about eight or nine, walking into the woods alone, and I nudged Annabeth. "Hey, is she going to be okay? Is she allowed in there?" Annabeth looked at me with a bemused expression on her face, that morphed into a smile. She shook her head and kept walking. When I looked back, the girl was gone. I blinked and looked again. That small oak tree had not been there before...

"Annabeth! Who's this?" Two guys were coming towards me. They both looked a little older than I was. One of them was kind of thin and scrawny, with a cap covering his curly head. He walked with this weird shuffle-step that looked like he had something wrong with his legs. The other one had black hair and green eyes that kind of reminded me of the ocean...I don't know why. This guy's walk looked pretty confident, which didn't match the slightly nervous expression on his face. He was twirling something between his fingers, and I realized it was a ballpoint pen.

"Lyner, this is Grover," Annabeth pointed towards the scrawny guy, "and this is Percy." When she motioned towards the black-haired dude, I noticed a small blush creeping up her cheeks. "Percy and Grover, this is Lyner. His, uh, dad told him to come, and he did. Alone," she added, with a pointed look towards Grover, as if it meant something. He looked surprised.

"Without a, um, guide?" Grover frowned. "And he's...what, thirteen?" I nodded. "That's the age, Annabeth. Bla-ha-ha! That shouldn't be possible. And you say his dad told him to come?" He looked at me. "Who is your dad?"

That kind of unnerved me. My dad left when I was really little, so I don't know much about him. The first sign he knew I even existed came in a letter, telling me to go to this place called Camp Half-blood.

Percy was scrutinizing me closely. It hit me that his eyes, the ones that looked like the ocean, are the same color as mine. "Lyner," he said aloud, like he was testing my name. "Uh, let's go down to the dock." Annabeth looked at him strangely, and he pulled her close and whispered something in her ear. Her eyes widened, and she grinned nervously at him, whispering something back. They both laughed, and it made me feel uncomfortable. I mean, it was kind of obvious that Percy liked Annabeth, and I think Annabeth liked him too.

"Come on," Percy motioned with his head towards the lake. We walked in silence for a little bit. I was aware of Percy sneaking looks at me, appraising me. What did this guy want from me?
151.title: Go with Annabeth

choices: The wave breaks down on everyone
1511.content:
I was tired of it all. I didn't know what I was doing here, the people kept looking at me like they want me to do something amazing, and this place didn't seem like your average summer camp. So I just stopped. "No," I told Percy. "I don't want to go to the dock. I'm tired and would like to rest." I folded my arms and tried to look fierce.

Percy stopped, too. "Come on, kid, I just want to see something. I wouldn't hurt you, I promise. It's just a test."

"Don't call me kid!" I shouted. I really, really hate when people do that. My vision turned red, and I heard a roaring in my ears. I wanted to hit Percy, wanted to wipe that look off of his face. I felt the lake near me, and for some reason I could smell the ocean. I felt stronger and more confident now. I took a deep breath and...pushed. Not with my body, but kind of with my mind. I heard something that sounded like a huge river, and then a startled exclamation.

"What the--" I opened my eyes when I heard Percy's voice. He sounded like he was choking on something, and I just about fainted when I saw what was happening. The water in the lake was rising up, forming the biggest tidal wave I have ever seen in my life. Something inside me whispered for more, so I pushed harder. The wave swelled even higher, and someone screamed. It might have been me.

Percy shook himself out of his shocked state. "Stop, Lyner!" he shouted. "It's too much!"

"I can't!" I called back, frightened because it was true. I told myself to stop, but there was a tugging in my gut that wouldn't quit.
1511.title: Tidal Wave!

15111.content:
Suddenly an electric shock went through me, as if I had been striked by lightening. And just at that moment, the water backed down. Percy looked at me, eyes wide, his mouth almost touching the wet floor. By looking at him, I felt angry, so I punched him in his jaw. His mouth shut so hard that he bit his tongue,and is bleeding. He gave me the evil eye, and that reminded me of the metal lion I killed in Washington D.C., it gave me the same evil eye when I threw a water gun down its throat. Anyway Percy looked at me and said:" Son of Poseidon. Lyner Barsette, you are the Son of Poseidon."

The sky turned dark and thunder rumbled. Suddenly, a guy in wheelchair appeared beside Percy. He looks at Percy and speaks softly to him:"Don't be so sure Percy."

Percy said:" But..but Chiron, he just called that tidal wave from the lake."

Chiron( or what I guess his name was) turned to me, and spoke:" Lyner, do you know how to shoot arrows."

I beamed:" Of course!! I'm the best in my school."

Chiron smiled and asked:" Do you have dyslexia?"

I looked at him, puzzled:" Of course not! Why do you ask?"

Chiron smiled at me:" Lyner do you believe that Greek Gods really exist?"

I replied:" No, I am Christian."

Chiron smiled at me and said:" Jesus was the son of Zeus, did you know that?"

I looked at him, eyes wide and stammered:" You...you...you must be crazy!"

Percy held up a pen, but Chiron held him back.

I was angry, the guy just insulted Jesus and he held back Percy from charging me just because Percy held up a pen. So I clutched my necklace, and it morphed into a sword.

Chiron was surprised at the sight of my sword and gasped:" Blade of Olympus!"

Percy looked at him, bewildered:" What is 'Blade of Olympus'?"

Chiron explained:" The Blade of Olympus is given to a pandora or gift from everyone in Greek. A pandora is a god who is the child of Zeus and Hera, all the gods give the pandora a fragment of their power which is infinite. When the pandora has ended their mortal life, they will be judged to see if they can qualify for being a god or not. Every century only has one pandora."
15111.title: My True Idenity

151111.content:
" But you seem different. You possess more power and discipline than any other Pandora I have seen."

I asked:" Um... Sir, I think I don't quite understand what you are talking about. Percy said I was the son of Poseidon. Who is Poseidon? And you said I was the son of Zeus and Hera. Who are they?"

Percy shot me an amused look and said:" A demigod, not knowing who Zeus, Poseidon and Hera is? So laughable."

Chiron smiled gently and said:" That might not always be the case. Lyner, do you know who is Jupiter?"

I answered:" Yes, the Roman God of the Sky, Lighting, and Lord of the Gods."

Percy grinned smugly:"Same as Zeus for the Greeks."

I asked:" Wasn't Greece conquered by Rome?"

Percy's face turned red:" What are you talking about? Rome? We are Greeks, and you talk as if you're Roman."

Chiron said:"He is Roman. Percy, you understand what I say?"

As Percy is busy translating, I replied:"Yes, sir, you were just speaking Latin." I don't know how I learned to speak Latin, but I just do.

Chiron smiled, but it quickly faded into worry:"But a Child of Rome in Greek territory, that is strange. And you are a Roman Pandora, how strange."
151111.title: Continue

choices: Ask what the symbols on your arm mean
1511111.content:
Chiron wheeled over. I backed up and ,by instinct, reached for my necklace. Chiron smiled, and ,with his eyes, comforted me, telling me to let go of my necklace. I did what he told me to do. Chiron came over, grabbed my sleeve, pulled it up, and shook his head. I looked at my arm. The letters SPQR and five lines under it was visible on my arm.

"Senatus Populusque Romanus." I read the letters. It meant "the Senate and People of Rome".

Chiron pursed his lips. He turned to Percy and said: "Looks like time for another prophecy..."
1511111.title: Roman? Greek?

choices: You wake up in a cabin
You wake up in a big house with a guy in weelchair
1512.content:
We arrived at the dock and the guy, Percy looked at the water for a while, then he picked a spot and told me to jump. Holy cow! What was he thinking? This spot looks like fifteen deep from the surface to the sand below. I eyed him suspiciously, and asked :" Whadda ya want from me?"

He gave me a half-hearted smile and said:" Jump. Kiddo, nothing will happen to you, and if anything happened to you, I will save you."

I hate when people call me kiddo, it's what the class bully used to call me in grade five. My eyes changed color, from sea green to a misty grey. This is what happens when I get upset, my eyes change color. I yell:" Back off!!!"

Suddenly three bolts of lightening struck the earth beside me. Percy was caught off guard and his clothes caught on fire. In a spit second, three jets of water shot at me, willed by Percy. I willed the water jets into a ball and send it back at Percy. Percy was stunned by this move and was knocked out of balance onto the ground. I panted from doing those things. Then I fainted.
1512.title: Fight with Percy

choices: Other demigods are attacking the camp!
15122.content:
The guy in the wheelchair looked at me very nervously. He seemed to have taken care of me for a long time.

I looked up at him and asked:" Um... excuse me sir, who are you?"

The man smiled and replied:" I am who I am, young one, but you can call me Chiron."

I knitted my eye brows:" Chiron, that's a cool name. Sounds Greek, not Latin."

Chiron looked confused:" Latin? Do you speak Latin?"

I answered:"I don't think so." Then I realized I just spoke Latin.

Chiron pursed his lips and said, mostly to himself:" A Latin speaking child...... Romans!" He spoke the word "Romans" in Latin.

I looked at him, bewildered:" Romans? Aren't they in Italy? Founded by a child of Mars, who was a Trojan that escaped the Trojan war, and eventually conquered the whole Mediterranean, including Greece?"

Chiron smiled:" You seem to know a lot, don't you?"

I grinned:" Basic history."

Chiron said:" Then tell me the history of the Greeks."

I thought about what I learned before, but I can't remember anything about Greece, so I said:" I don't know,sir."

Chiron said:" And when you were talking about the history of Rome, you said the founder was a child of Mars, why didn't you say Ares?"

I pondered over it for a while, then I replied:" Maybe because I was talking about Rome, not Greece."

Chiron said, half worried:" No, that is because your brain is hardwired for Latin and Roman customs."

I asked:" What do you mean? I don't understand."

Chiron said in Latin:"You know how to speak Latin, which is the language of Rome. You say the names of the Gods and Goddesses in Roman. You are a child of Rome. A demigod sought by the Roman Gods!"

I replied:"Child of Rome, what is it?"

Chiron was about to reply when Percy bursted in.
15122.title: You wake up in a big house with a guy in weelchair

151222.content:
Percy choked on the words, but managed to spit out: "Annabeth... gone... arrghhh... taken by other demigods..."

Chiron looked at him, surprised, and then got up from his wheelchair. He instantly transformed into a centaur, a creature that is horse from waist down. He started pacing around the room. The room was obviously too small for his "horse-sized" body, and he knocked over lots of trophies and other small decorations on the tables. Chiron didn't see to notice that. Percy and I had to dodge incoming assaults of falling objects and projectiles knocked over by Chiron's tail.

Chiron turned abruptly and said: "Let's go, we will look outside."

We followed Chiron out of the room, running through the forest, by a lake, and through cabins. We arrived at the camp's borders, protected by the huge dragon-like thing outside. There were a group of demigods near the border, attacking the dragon. I stepped up.

"What are you guys doing?" I half asked, half bellowed.

One of the boys, seemingly their leader, walked up and replied: "Our augur predicted the presence of another camp of demigods on the Eastern side. He was right. We Romans shall crush you graecus."

"What is the meaning of this, Lupa?" Chiron demanded from behind.

The crowd of Roman half-bloods separated, and a female wolf emerged from the ranks. She growled at Chiron and, surprisingly, spoke: "Fools, the Gods cannot win this war, we have decided to join the Titans." She howled at the sky, even though it's still daytime. "You shall be annihilated!"

Lupa growled while the Romans raised their spears and shields, chanting: "Senatus Populusque Romanus!" over and over.

Finally the leader guy raised his sword and cried: "Twelfth Legion Fulminata!!"
151222.title: Annabeth dissapeared!

152.content:
Something nagged me in the back of my head, telling me that don't go. I hesitated, and suddenly the dragon-like creature snapped at me, I rolled back instantly. I was angry and my eyes shifted color, from the usual sea green into a electric blue. I yell:" Are you trying to KILL me!!??"

Annabeth looked at me confused(I know she's just acting) and said:"What do you mean?"

I feel adrenalin pumping through my veins, I certainly want to kill this girl, no matter how hot she is.

I charged at her and thrust my blade at her.Clang! My blade hit a hard obstacle that blocked my blow. I looked at that obstacle, it was the dragon's teeth. Then in a split second, one of the dragon's head snapped at me, again. I barely dodged it and it cut my cheek slightly, leaving a small cut right below my right eye. Annabeth gasped and backed away, she look stunned (God knows why), and I attacked her, throwing my sword hilt at her. It was blocked again by the dragon. Annabeth recovered from the shock and started attacking me again.

After a while I just couldn't take two people fighting me, and I started backing away. I dodged the dragon's bared fangs by just mere inches by bending down, and suddenly a dagger appeared out of nowhere and proceeded towards my heart. The moment before it touched me, a strong force pushed Annabeth and the dragon's heads back. I was safe, for now.

I turned around and saw a huge man behind me, I let out a scream. The man smiled and boomed:" Lyner, I am from the Organization, we are enemies of them," he pointed at Annabeth and the dragon." Come and join us."

"No, don't Lyner!! They are the evil ones, not us!" Annabeth shouted.

" Ah, Annabeth, Luke wanted me to say hello to you. He is also in the Organization." The guy chuckled.

"What... Lu..Luke....Luke?" Annabeth muttered.

The guy turned to me and asked :" What's your choice?"

I weighted the options. This guy saved me, and Annabeth tried to kill me. But I still kinda like Annabeth, despite she tried to kill me. Something in the back of my mind tells me to run away from them both.
152.title: A Choice That Will Change Every Thing

1521.content:
I decided to follow Annabeth into the camp. I moved towards the camp, but the big guy stopped me,"Lyner, you are making the wrong choice."

I ignored him, and continued on to camp. Suddenly, the guy let out a war cry, Annabeth fainted from the force, and the Dragon-serpent slumped down on the ground.

The guy smirked and said:"It's you and me now." He drew his double sided sword

I got really angry, no one, and I mean NO ONE hurts the girl I like. I clutched my necklace again and it popped back into a sword. I stepped up towards the guy, driven by anger, I thrust my blade towards his legs, but was blocked easily. He guy countered my attack and made me take a step back. I calmed down and feinted a quick strike to his right, when the sword tip was one inch in front of his right eye, I swerved the sword down to make a hard stab on his stomach.(This move won me the fencing champion of the state.) The guy lowered his sword down casually and blocked my attack again. I tried again, slashing at his hips. He blocked the slash with his blade, I used my tip to slide against the flat of his blade, and made a quick thrust towards his wrist when my sword tip got close to his sword hilt. He used his oversized hand to bat my sword down and kicked my sword away. My first reaction was to punch him, but my hands were held by a pair of strong hands. I looked up and saw the guy laughing," You are my prisoner now! HA HA HA HA!!"

I kicked and squirmed when suddenly a lightning struck down from the sky, and the guy backed off me. A man in Greekish tunic floated down from the sky, you heard me floated from the sky. He held a lightning bolt??!! The man spoke:" Stay away from the Pandora."

Pandora, isn't it the girl who opened a box and... I thought. The big guy bellowed:"You will fall, Zeus! So will Olympus! We, Titans will rise to POWER!!!"

"Time for you to go to Tartarus, Octraseus." The man cast down another lightning and the big guy disappeared. The man waved his hand and I fainted.
1521.title: Follow Annabeth

15211.content:
I woke up in a soft bed. The moment I woke up, I reached wildly for my sword, but mt hands touched something soft. I opened my eyes, and I saw Annabeth beside me, and I'm holding her HAND??!! I quickly let go of her hand and muttered:"Sorry..."

She smiled at me(Oh my God, I think I'm gonna bleed through my nose), and said:"You've been sleeping for two days, I'm so worried."

I grinned sheepishly:"You're worried about me?"

Annabeth suddenly blushed and replied:"You are the Pandora, of course I would be worried. Because if you die, then no one can stop the Titan Organization."

I stared at her blankly, I mean what's your response if someone said that to you, with a creak, someone entered the room. I looked at the guy, he is on a wheelchair, but the wheelchair seems to be automatic, 'cause he ain't touching the chair, rather reading a book. He guy smiled at Annabeth and said:"Annabeth, stop talking nonsense, you will confuse him."

Annabeth breathed a quick "OK" and left the room. The guy smiled at me and introduced himself:"I am Mr. Brunner, the activity director of this camp, may I show you around?"

"Oh, of course, Mr. Brunner." I said, and tried to get up. My knees felt weak and I collapsed back onto the bed. Suddenly a wave of pain ran through my body, and I fainted again.

When I woke up again, Mr. Brunner was talking to Annabeth, he said:"Annabeth, do not tell him anything, not even his true identity, just say he is a normal half-blood."

"Understood, Chiron. Sorry, I was too reckless last time."

Chiron smiled and left, something was wrong about him, he is half horse! Annabeth turned to me and saw me stare wide-eyed at the door, she held my hand and asked:"How do you feel now?"

"Fine, I guess." I'm always fine when you hold my hands, I thought.

Annabeth took out a cup filled with strawberry smoothie(I think it is), and gave it to me. I suddenly had a mischievous thought, I pretended to drop the cup, Annabeth quickly cleared up the mess and got a new cup, and fed me the smoothie. Man! I feel like I'm in heaven. The smoothie was strange, it tasted like chocolate, but if felt warm, even with chunks of ice in it.

Before I knew it, I finished the drink and I felt a lot better. Annabeth suggested to give me tour in camp, of course, I agreed. She showed me the archery range, and a sword fighting arena, when we got near a bathroom, a group of girls stopped us. These girls were huge, I mean they can make professional wrestler like Undertaker or Triple H run for their mommy. One of them stepped out and said in a nasty tone:"Yo, wise girl, hanging out with this guy? What about your boyfriend? Percy's heart is broken. Ha, ha, ha." Their laugh was terrible, it sounded kind of like crows.
15211.title: Read on

choices: Ask her who this "Percy" guy is
152111.content:
"Apologize." I said this through my teeth.

The girls looked shocked, even Annabeth tried to pull me away, but I stood there, looking confident. That girl gritted her teeth and said:" Say that one more time."

"Apologize. Is your IQ that low? How many times do I have to repeat myself? Apologize." I said, casually.

"Alright, slacker, you will pay for this!" She bellowed.

"In your dreams." I said, and I realized that I just spoke in Latin.

"What?!" The bid girl look confused.

"It doesn't matter, just apologize!" I screamed.

The girl squinted at me and pulled out a spear from her back. I tried to grab for my necklace, but it wasn't there, so I just picked up a wooden stick. She charged at me, and I sidestepped, gave a quick feint to her waist, twisted my body around and whacked her hard on the head. She went sprawling on the ground. Annabeth cheered and I had a smug look on my face. The girl tried to get up, but to no avail, finally, her gang came and helped her. She got up, shot a murderous look at me and said:" I will get you, Barsette. I will." and she limped away.

Annabeth looked at me, amazed, and she said:" Wow, she's the camp's best fighter, aside from Percy."
152111.title: Make them apologize

1521111.content:
Annabeth looked at me, sighed and said: "Percy is my boyfriend. He's the camp's best fighter, and the unofficial 'leader'."

My heart dropped... Annabeth.... boyfriend? Percy? My head swam, and before I knew it, I fainted (again).

When I woke up again, Chiron was on his wheelchair smiling at me. I sat up and asked: "Where is Annabeth?"

Chiron looked up from his book and replied: "She is with the others, playing capture the flag." He looked at me intensely and asked: "Would you like to play too?"
1521111.title: Percy?

choices: Go up and talk to him
1522.content:
"I...I...I will join the Organization!" I stammered.

"Ha,ha,ha,ha, you made the right choice kiddo." The guy laughed.

"No! Lyner, don't! Don't go with him..." Annabeth's voice is muffled by a curtain of darkness, which breaks a moment later. I am now standing in a huge room filled with over sized guys with weapons. Only one person looks normal, he is holding a strange colored sword, and a scar under his right eye, just like me.

What should I do?
1522.title: Join the Organization

1523.content: I tried to run but pain took over my body. My head throbbed and I was so dizzy that I fell onto the ground. Suddenly I remembered that Greek Serpent Drakons are poisonous. I realized that this is a serpent drakon, but it's too late. I was slowly losing consciousness. The last thing I saw before I let pain completely take over my body was Annabeth's beautiful face looking at me. Just this picture was enough, I used my last shreds of strength and managed to smile at her. Then I closed my eyes......
1523.title: Death

154.content:
I stood there, frozen with indecision. The dragon eyed me, then all of a sudden, it snapped at me. I barely got out of the way in time! Angry now, I turn to the girl. She obviously told the dragon to attack me! I felt my blood bubbling. "What is your problem?" I shouted at her. "I could die!"

Her face changed. "What are you talking about?"

"You know what. The dragon." Annabeth didn't say anything, and I took that to be a yes. I grabbed my necklace, and once again it morphed into a sword. "Well, if you think it's so funny, then try fighting me. Come on, are you brave enough?"

Annabeth looked like she was trying not to laugh. "Okay, you're overreacting. Come on into the--"

She didn't get to finish her sentence. I charged her, my anger getting the best of me like it always does. I used to take sword-fighting lessons (okay, fencing), so I knew a few things about fighting. I aimed my sword at her leg, trying to just wound her to let her know how angry I was.

CLANG! My sword was blocked. Before my brain could register that, whatever had blocked my weapon was on the offensive. I had been the most skilled in my fencing classes, and I could barely keep up with the onslaught of the girl. I tried one more desperate move--a fake swing to the left, followed by a quick thrust to the right. Annabeth neatly sidestepped my sword, grabbed my wrist, and twisted it so my sword fell out of my grasp. I took a swing at her with my left hand, but she took hold of that one too. Then she twisted them so they were pinned against my back. "Nice try," she whispered in my ear, "but next time, pick on someone your own size."
154.title: Fighting Annabeth

choices: Try to talk to this guy
1541.content:
Now I was really angry, but I calmed myself down. I thought of a plan, but I'm not sure if it'll work or not. So I took a deep breath and smiled at her. Concentrating all my special power on girls, I released that special aura that made all female within a ten feet radius fall in love with me. Annabeth look at me surprised and backed off me. Using that split second, I drew my sword and had Annabeth under control. The dragon whipped at me and suddenly, Annabeth said to the dragon:" Stop Ladon! He is not our enemy!"

The dragon stopped in track, and I knew that my plan has succeeded. I smiled at Annabeth, and she blushed. Then a dark-haired guy came running towards us. He took out a ball-point pen, and it morphed into a sword. Goody, another opponent to fight.

He rushed beside Annabeth and asked her how she feel. But she did not answer. OOPS, my power went too far and she fainted. Anyway, the guy turned to me attacked me.
1541.title: A Plan.

15411.content:
I charged the guy and he rolled aside yelling:"You fiend, what have you done to Annabeth?!"

"What?? Whadda ya talking about?" I asked.

"Why has Annabeth fainted?! What have you done?!! Did you kill her?!!!" Percy bellowed.

"Oh, she just fainted, don't worry." I said casually.

"What, just fainted??!!"I hate it when Percy emphasizes the words, just plain annoying.

I saw there was no reasoning with this guy, so I charged at him.I surprised him and he didn't have the time to uncap his pen, so he kept backing towards the dragon. I slashed wildly at him, but now he has his pen uncapped and he blocked all my blows. Suddenly the dragon striked at me. Percy also striked at me at the same time. Percy's blow was attacking my arm and the dragon attacked my head. I can only block one at a time. If I block Percy's blow, then the dragon could kill me, but if I block the dragon's blow, then I would lose my advantage of offense over Percy.
15411.title: Fight Back

1542.content:
" Okay, okay, I surrender, you win." I muttered.

Annabeth smiled, and she kissed me on the cheek. I blushed, even my neck was red. She took me inside to camp, and it was so cool! There are stables, weapons, sword training, even a lake of it's own! And the one that amazes me the most is the archery training ground, totally awesome! I was assigned in Cabin Eleven, which is full of guys. It's so crowded while cabins like Cabin One, Two, Three are nearly empty. Confused, I asked Annabeth why, but she just smiled. So I got this small spot on the crowded ground of Cabin Eleven. The guy in charge of the cabin is called Connor. He looks very elvish and he is nearly always smiling.

The second day at camp, Annabeth asked me out for a walk in the woods. I agreed and we walked into the woods. Annabeth introduced me to two guys named Percy and Grover. Percy has black hair and green eyes that remind me of the...ocean. Grover is a scrawny guy who looks way older than his age, and he walks strange, like his legs are injured. Annabeth seems to like this Percy guy, and he seems to like her too, which made me kind of jealous.

So I was determined to win Annabeth's heart. My plan was to beat Percy at everything, and make him look weak in front of Annabeth, so I asked him for a archery competition, which I knew was his worst subject. But to my surprise, he agreed. Because Annabeth is there, he didn't want to look scared in front of Annabeth.

So I easily won him and Annabeth even clapped for me. I was so happy. After I went back to the cabin, Connor, our guy in charge asked me:" Are you in love with Annabeth?"

That question choked me, I look at him, surprised:" What made you think so?"

He grinned:" You asking Percy on a archery competition."
1542.title: Camp, Is Not So Bad. Without Percy

15421.content:
"Well...I..." I stammered, confused as how to answer. Connor had a glint in his mischievous eyes, like he already knew, so I didn't see the harm in telling him. "Yes," I muttered.

He shook his head with a grin. "You MUST be new, if you don't know what's going on between Percy and Annabeth. Trust me, it'll be better for your health--and probably all of ours--if you back off." But he looked grudging, like he didn't really like what he was saying. I studied him for a few minutes because I thought I knew what was going on. One of my friends, back in Miami, was this really huge practical joker. I mean, he loved to play pranks on people! Then he got in trouble, because people told him he needed to grow up. So he stopped, but he was always on the lookout for an opportunity. Whenever he found one, he got this look on his face, exactly like the one Connor had right now...like he had trouble deciding whether to take the chance or not.

A ha, I thought. "Come on, Connor, I really like her. But I don't know how to get Percy away! I mean, he's good at a whole bunch of stuff. But I want to beat him and make him look bad. It would be really funny..." I put on my most pleading look. "Would you help me?"

Connor looked frozen with indecision. Just as I thought--this guy was a prankster, and a big one at that. "I don't know," he began. "It wouldn't really be right. I don't think I should do this..."
15421.title: Admit

154212.content:
"...Okay! Nobody gets away messing with the girl guys in our cabin likes." He grinned, and I grinned back.

The next day Connor announced that our cabin, the Hermes cabin( I don't know why they use Greek god and goddess's names to name the cabins) will go against the Poseidon's cabin which is Percy's cabin in capture the flag.

On the day for the duel, we went into the woods. Percy's cabin has three people, Percy and Tyson( a HUGE guy) and a guy named Joe who was borned in 1897, but he was trapped in Lotus Hotel and Casino. But they were allied with Apollo's cabin and Athena's cabin( which was Annabeth's cabin). We had the rest of the cabins on our side. They were Ares, Demeter, Hephaestus, Aphrodite( which had girlie boys and girls), and Dionysus, also the cabin that they call the new cabin, Hades.

Chiron, our activities director who likes to dress up as a centaur, announced:" Heroes! You know the rules, no killing and maiming, and Hermes's cabin will be in the West wood, and Poseidon's cabin on the East."

A girl called( I think) Clarisse, who is the leader of the Ares cabin( all tough looking guys and girls) whispered to me:" Hey new kid, you don't like Jackson, right?"

I asked:" How did you know?"

She snickered:" I heard that Connor challenged them for you."

I agreed:" Yeah, he's a total jerk."

She laughed:" That, you got it right."

Then a guy called( I think, again) Nico, the only kid in the Hades cabin, came over and asked me:" Hey! Lyner right?" I nodded, and he continued on" What position will you be in?"

That question made me shut down, I don't know.

Nico eyed me for a while and asked:" Do you want to be on the offense or defense?"
154212.title: Capture the Flag!!

1542121.content:
" Offense, I guess." I muttered.

"Okay, stick with Clarisse." Nico said.

" Charge!!" a battle cry started beside me. I turned and found that the whole " army",except the defensive guys, has charged past a small creek already. So I ran after them. Holy Sh!t, this forest is HUGE! I got lost in it twice (thankfully Clarisse found me). Finally my squad encountered Percy's squad. My eyes turned bright red (it always happen when I'm angry), and I charged Percy. He swiftly sidestepped and hit me on the back of my neck with his sword hilt. I went sprawling onto the ground, but the split second I touch the ground, I sprang back up. I slashed at Percy and ripped his sleeve. The blow surprised him and he backed away, not watching the ground. His feet caught a tree root and he tripped over it.

I pointed my blade at his throat and smiled:" Not so cool are you now?"

" What the?" Percy stammered.

I turned and ran towards their flag. I plucked it from the boulder it was placed on and ran back. I was as swift as a deer and no one can even keep up with me.

After a while of running, I was tired and I looked around. Damn! I was lost again! Suddenly I heard someone speaking, and a group of Athena's cabin's campers came out of the bushes. Their leader was Annabeth. What!! I ran into them, bad luck.
1542121.title: Go in offense

15421211.content:
I gripped my necklace, which morphed into a sword. Annabeth pulled out a knife and stabbed at me. The rest of the Athena campers used pincer movement and surrounded me. I tried to break through the formation by charging West, then suddenly attack North. Bang! I slammed into one of their shields. I backed off a little and I regain balance, then I feinted a thrust towards the guy on the East side, then I jumped over Annabeth. The split second I touch the ground I stared running, leaving Annabeth's squad far behind.

I ran and ran until I reached the place that our squad encountered Percy. I saw shields and swords all over the place, so I turned away and ran towards the West. I ran and ran until I arrived at the creek, I saw my team fighting with Percy's team. Should I help them, or should I just take the flag back?
15421211.title: Win the Game or Save My Friends?

154212112.content:
I sprinted, full speed ahead towards our encampment. Soon, our cabin's flag came into my view. I sprinted even faster, only to find that our camp was raided by Athena's cabin, a couple of the Athena guys stayed and tried to reach our flag ( it was high on a boulder). I crept behind them, and gave each of them a crippling backstab. I climbed up the boulder easily and set Poseidon's flag on to of the boulder, beside our own flag. Everyone gathered around and Chiron announced that We won.

I was so happy that I almost fell off the boulder, but, I got down safely. Annabeth's cabin all look sullen and the Apollo cabin cursed in Greek.
154212112.title: Take the Flag and GO!!

15422.content:
"No I don't! I really like a girl in the Aphrodite's cabin." I lied.

"Really? Who is it?" Connor looked at me, suspicious,"Who in the cabin has the honor of being loved by our cabin's guys?"

I thought about it for a while, there was a girl named Auricia who I heard liked me, she has blond hair, a perfect face and lines. She likes to smile to everyone. But there was another girl who I kinda like, her name is Adreana, she looks real nice, and she is nicest person in camp to me after Annabeth and Connor. Who should I say?
15422.title: Lie

info.brief_description: The half-bloods are on another adventure.
info.description:
Ok,this is about Percy and another adventure of his.
You can chose from the following characters
---Percy(our old hero of the day)
---Annabeth(Yes,the wise girl)
---Grover(that funny satyr)
---And of course our main bad guy Luke
---A new half-blood/pandora(gift from everyone)
There will be cursing.
Dead ends are allowed but keep it as rare as possible, please no sex or any of those adult sh!t.
And please,I want some twist in the plot.
May contain verbal violence.

(Chapters added by Death Shadow and me will contain cursing)
